rows.label: qst701510_msg0001
rows.name: So, it's an illness...

rows.label: qst701510_msg0002
rows.name:
And you still decided
to come all this way.

rows.label: qst701510_msg0003
rows.name: It's thanks to the people here.

rows.label: qst701510_msg0004
rows.name:
Even though my time is short, I was
scolded by the young ones, asking what
I was doing not doing what I can now.

rows.label: qst701510_msg0005
rows.name: I chose my words a bit more carefully.

rows.label: qst701510_msg0006
rows.name: It didn't sound like that.

rows.label: qst701510_msg0007
rows.name: Everyone, let me thank you as well.

rows.label: qst701510_msg0008
rows.name:
When you get old, you get
tangled up in obligations
and can't move freely.

rows.label: qst701510_msg0009
rows.name:
We just get used to giving up
and deceiving ourselves. That's
no good, for both of us.

rows.label: qst701510_msg0010
rows.name: Yes... that's so true.

rows.label: qst701510_msg0011
rows.name:
Mirei, how about it? Why don't
you rest here today? We have
a lot to catch up on.

rows.label: qst701510_msg0012
rows.name:
I'd also like to discuss
where to display your vase.

rows.label: qst701510_msg0013
rows.name: Teo...

rows.label: qst701510_msg0014
rows.name:
Sniff... I can't. I was
holding it back, but.

rows.label: qst701510_msg0015
rows.name: Shall we leave them alone?

rows.label: qst701510_msg0016
rows.name: Wait.

rows.label: qst701510_msg0017
rows.name:
I've been curious for a
while, but I think I've
seen you once in Acedia.

rows.label: qst701510_msg0018
rows.name:
I believe... his name was Deacon Marveni?
During a pilgrimage, he kindly helped me
when I was having trouble on the stairs.

rows.label: qst701510_msg0025
rows.name:
You were serving him,
weren't you? Is he well?

rows.label: qst701510_msg0020
rows.name:
No matter how full of hardship
a life may be, all lives will
be saved... I believe so.

rows.label: qst701510_msg0021
rows.name: Please take this.

rows.label: qst701510_msg0022
rows.name: This is...

rows.label: qst701510_msg0023
rows.name:
I'm sorry it's handmade. It's something
I made to ward off evil and wish for
happiness. I don't need it anymore.

rows.label: qst701510_msg0024
rows.name: May your path also be blessed...
